outputs.output_descr: Through the project, Vanuatu will prepare a National Communication comprising three major elements: a national greenhouse gas inventory, abatement analysis, and vulnerability and adaptation assessments. The project will assist Vanuatu meet its reporting obligations to the UNFCCC.

project_descr: This project is to conduct a stocktaking exercise, stakeholder consultations and submit a proposal for the preparation of Vanuatu's Second National Communication to the UNFCCC
